tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_profiles (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    email_address VARCHAR(100),
    skills VARCHAR(255),
    experience_years INT,
    training_records TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR,
    skills VARCHAR[],
    experience_years INT,
    training_records JSON
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR,
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    team_lead INT REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
    department_id INT REFERENCES departments(department_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employees ( 
	id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
	name VARCHAR(50), 
	skills TEXT[], 
	experience INT, 
	training_records JSONB 
);

CREATE TABLE employee_positions ( 
	employee_id INT, 
	position_id INT, 
	start_date DATE, 
	PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, position_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(id), 
	FOREIGN KEY (position_id) REFERENCES positions(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeProfiles (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    hire_date DATE,
    skills TEXT,
    experience TEXT,
    training_records JSON
);

CREATE TABLE Experience (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    job_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    training_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    training_date DATE,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
);
